statements: SELECT * FROM inventory;
SELECT product_name, available_quantity FROM inventory;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM inventory ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE available_quantity > 0;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_products FROM inventory;
SELECT * FROM inventory ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM inventory WHERE available_quantity > 0;
SELECT product_name, available_quantity FROM inventory WHERE product_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT product_id, product_name, available_quantity FROM inventory WHERE product_name LIKE '%apple%';
SELECT product_id, product_name, available_quantity FROM inventory WHERE available_quantity BETWEEN 10 AND 20;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM products WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM products WHERE quantity >= 10 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT products.product_name, inventory.quantity FROM products INNER JOIN inventory ON products.product_id = inventory.product_id;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM products WHERE product_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT product_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM products GROUP BY product_id;
SELECT p.product_name, i.quantity FROM products p INNER JOIN inventory i ON p.product_id = i.product_id;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM products ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE stock_quantity > 0;
SELECT product_name, stock_quantity FROM products ORDER BY stock_quantity DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, stock_quantity FROM products WHERE stock_quantity < 10;
SELECT product_name, location_name, quantity FROM products p JOIN inventory i ON p.product_id = i.product_id JOIN locations l ON i.location_id = l.location_id;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity BETWEEN 10 AND 50 ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, stock_quantity FROM products WHERE stock_quantity > 100;
SELECT location_id, location_name FROM locations ORDER BY location_name DESC;

SELECT products.product_name, locations.location_name, inventory.quantity FROM products JOIN inventory ON products.product_id = inventory.product_id JOIN locations ON inventory.location_id = locations.location_id;
SELECT product_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM inventory GROUP BY product_id HAVING total_quantity > 50;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM products WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT location_name FROM locations ORDER BY location_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 10 AND 50;
SELECT product_id, product_name, quantity, price FROM products WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM inventory INNER JOIN products ON inventory.product_id = products.product_id WHERE location_id = 1 AND quantity > 0 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 10.00 AND 50.00;
SELECT location_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM locations INNER JOIN inventory ON locations.location_id = inventory.location_id GROUP BY location_name;
SELECT * FROM sales WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND timestamp <= '2022-12-31 23:59:59';
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, product_category FROM products WHERE quantity_in_stock > 0;
SELECT product_name, product_category, quantity_in_stock FROM products ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, product_category FROM products WHERE product_id = 3;
SELECT product_name, quantity_in_stock FROM products WHERE product_category = 'Electronics';
SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity_in_stock FROM products WHERE product_category='Electronics';
SELECT p.product_name, w.warehouse_name, wi.quantity_in_stock FROM products p JOIN warehouse_inventory wi ON p.product_id = wi.product_id JOIN warehouses w ON w.warehouse_id = wi.warehouse_id;
SELECT p.product_name, ph.timestamp, ph.action FROM products p JOIN product_history ph ON p.product_id = ph.product_id WHERE ph.action = 'Restocked' ORDER BY ph.timestamp DESC;

SELECT w.warehouse_name, SUM(wi.quantity_in_stock) AS total_quantity FROM warehouses w JOIN warehouse_inventory wi ON w.warehouse_id = wi.warehouse_id GROUP BY w.warehouse_name ORDER BY total_quantity DESC;
